title: Ap/Utility Supports and Armor
body:
What's everyone's opinion on a support item with armor. Preferably one for the utility supports (Lulu, Sona, Janna, Karma). 
Is there a reason there isn't really an armor support item yet? I mean the frozen heart I guess, but that's more for melee, and is expensive, and nerfed.
I remember there used to be an item that was like the locket but gave armor to nearby allies with the magic resist, I'm not asking for that item specifically back because as I recall it was immensely strong, but I feel like the ap/utility supports need better itemization options when it comes to stuff like this.

replies.body: Zekes Harbinger is pretty good. Gives mana, armor, AP and CDR plus the awesome passive for only 2250.

To be completely honest, I forgot all about this item......

/thread please ;_;

{{item:3512}}  is great. 60 armour and 60 magic resist, plus situational movement speed, plus amazing lane pressure. It's good for all ELOs low ELO, the enemy won't react fast enough, high ELO it forces the enemy into a teamfight that favours you.

With that, grabbing a {{item:3116}} and you are plenty tanky, plus all the utility these items bring, it's amazing.
